abstract: Selling fully furnished luxury homes and condominiums is growing trend nationwide and affluent buyers are embracing turnkey homes that offer look of tasteful decor that has been lived in for some time.
lead_paragraph: A growing trend is selling fully furnished homes and condominiums designed to look as if people with high net worth and good taste have lived there for a long time.
snippet: A growing trend is selling fully furnished homes and condominiums designed to look as if people with high net worth and good taste have lived there for a long time.

headline.main: For Sale: Multimillion-Dollar Homes, Fully Furnished
headline.print_headline: For Sale, Including Pots and Pans
